titleStmt.title: An armor of proofe brought from the tower of Dauid, to fight against Spannyardes, and all enimies of the trueth, by R.C.
titleStmt.author: Cotton, Roger.

publicationStmt.publisher: By G. Simson and W. White,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: Armour of proofe, brought from the tower of Dauid.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
